header.title: smartly
header.description: No more annoying emails or building google forms. Post a job on Fursatak app , manage candidates , sort, filter and pick the right one.
header.jobs_available: Jobs are available on our app

description.easy_to_use: Fursatak team made everything you need that are simple but powerful.
description.videos: Now, you are able see real persons and analyse their personality and test their skills and knowledge.
description.effictive: Filter-out unwanted applications, using built-in criteria such as age, gender, experience ..etc.
description.co_workers: We realized that team collaboration in companies leads to successful hiring process. Here you are !
description.privacy: Your business and candidates data is highly confidencial. Only you can see it.
description.website: Need to build a career page for your campany and integrate it with your website ? here you go !
description.people_around: Using sorting tool, you can see prople neaby your orgazation first.
description.redirect_link: Having your own career website ? No problem , post on our app and let applicants go to your website.
description.interview: Invite potential candidates for interview (personally/ online), and see or edit you schedule

app.title: Via Fursatak app
app.desc: We recommend this option. You will get a control panel and tools to Sort, Filter, Evaluate. You can choose the most fit candidiase easily.

email.title: Via email
email.desc: Be aware that your email will be publicly visible to let candidates send their application. Pick this choice if you want to.

link.title: Via link
link.desc: Ideal for companies who have their online recruitment system. Choose this option to direct application the the job post link on your website.

video.title: Video uploading tool
video.description: Want to see your candidates ?Ask them to record a video + write some instructions to them explaining what you want them to say. Note that , maximum 5 min is allowed.

evaluation.title: Evaluation tool
evaluation.description: Use this tool to evaluate any skill or knowledge in a scle from 0 to 5. Examples: Level of English, Leadership skill, Using MS Excel ‚Ä¶etc. Plus, filter by minimum score you assigned.

people_nearby.title: People nearby
people_nearby.description: Show applicant close to your company or a specific city, or cities first.
people_nearby.sub_title: Show applicant close to your company or a specific city, or cities first.

students.value: Candidates must be students to be approved on this job

questionnaire.title: Selection tool
questionnaire.description: Ask questions with one selection allowed or multiple. Examples: Yes/No, Selecting profissional certificates, making a personal test or technical quiz ‚Ä¶etc. Also, apply filters based on answers.
questionnaire.candidate_lastone: To pass, candidate must select at last one approved answer
questionnaire.candidate_selectall: To pass, candidate must select all approved answer

category.non_filtered: All candidates - Smart filter not activated

values.comment_app: Ability to comment on applications and CVs
values.hr_tools: More tools: Online videos, Sort, Filter, Evaluate and Get more information about candidates
